Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
org.example.Business.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL extends Object
The OrderBLL (Business Logic Layer) class handles the logic for placing and managing orders. It validates orders, updates product stock levels, and delegates data operations to DAOs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new OrderBLL instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderBLL

      public OrderBLL()
      Constructs a new OrderBLL instance. Initializes DAOs for orders and products and sets up order validators.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      public Order insert(Order order)
      Inserts a new order into the database after validation. Also updates the product's available quantity.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order object to insert.
      Returns:
      The inserted Order object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the order fails validation.

    • findAllOrders

      public List<Order> findAllOrders()
      Retrieves all orders from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Order objects.

    • getOrderTable

      public DefaultTableModel getOrderTable(List<Order> orders)
      Creates a DefaultTableModel from a list of orders for display in a JTable.
      Parameters:
      orders - The list of Order objects.
      Returns:
      A DefaultTableModel suitable for displaying orders in a table.
